A & W
Back To Home Page
If you are interested in buying any of the items on this page, just email us at katriggs@tx.rr.com and please include your zip code (country if outside the USA) so we can include shipping cost when we reply. For payment we accept PayPal, money orders, personal checks or cash. Prices are not included here on the web site, but will be promptly provided once we receive your e-mail. We mail very quickly by USPS--usually within 24 hours or less of receiving payment--and every package in the USA is shipped with a delivery confirmation number.
MIP = Mint in Package NP = No Package U3 = Rated Safe For Children Under The Age Of Three
A&W -Miscellaneous Toys-
Click for larger image A&W -1997&1998- MIPs 1997 Beanie Bear "Orange Shirt&Hat"
1998 Beanie Bear "Turquoise Shirt&Hat" (x3) Three Beanie Bears in turquoise shirts have sold. COMMENT: All these Beanie Bears are approximately 6" tall.
